external_references.description: Ehrlich, A., et al. (2022, September). THE MYSTERY OF METADOR | AN UNATTRIBUTED THREAT HIDING IN TELCOS, ISPS, AND UNIVERSITIES. Retrieved January 23, 2023.

description: [Metador](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1013) has quickly deleted `cbd.exe` from a compromised host following the successful deployment of their malware.(Citation: SentinelLabs Metador Sept 2022)
